DOC.brief_summary: A randomized controlled pilot study was conducted to evaluate the effect of an acupuncture protocol for the treatment of vulvodynia. Hypotheses: 1. Acupuncture reduces vulvar pain and dyspareunia in women with vulvodynia. 2. Acupuncture increases sexual function in women with vulvodynia.
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture for the Treatment of Vulvodynia
DOC.criteria: Previously diagnosed with either generalized vulvodynia, localized vestibulodynia, or both Provoked vulvodynia Unprovoked vulvodynia Women between 18 years of age and menopause Pregnancy Menopause Interstitial cystitis Irritable bowel syndrome Untreated vaginitis Cervicitis Pelvic inflammatory disease Diagnosed with other pelvic pathology causing pain Concomitantly receiving physical therapy Concomitantly receiving biofeedback, Concomitantly receiving massage Concomitantly receiving additional acupuncture.
